title: IMotionPlotAxisFeatureData.ReferencePart
description: Gets or sets the result component.
remarks: A component is one of the vector elements. To define a vector, you need to specify a coordinate frame. You can select a part or a subassembly to define the vector with regards to the origin coordinate system of the selected part or subassembly. If nothing is selected, then the top assembly's coordinate system is used to define the vector.
